messages.title: A balanced budget for Britain & £8 billion extra for the NHS
messages.content: The Liberal Democrats have, in government boosted tax to £10,600 by cutting income tax for 24,000 local working people and slashing it for everyone else too, freezing council tax and bringing thousands of new jobs to our city.

messages.title: New Jobs Hub for Portsmouth
messages.content: We’re fighting to bring new employers into Portsmouth to replace the jobs lost from the dockyard.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Creating new jobs and a £400 tax cut for local workers
Investing £8 billion extra in the NHS
Cutting taxes for local people by raising the tax-free allowance to £10,600, ensuring fair funding for Portsmouth, and campaigning to save the dockyard

issues.governance: Cutting taxes for local people by raising the tax-free allowance to £10,600, ensuring fair funding for Portsmouth, and campaigning to save the dockyard
issues.health: Investing £8 billion extra in the NHS

images.caption: Gerald Vernon-Jackson and Suzy Horton campaigning

leaflet.additionalNotes: Leaflets emphasize the Liberal Democrats' achievements and plans for Britain and Portsmouth. The material contains photos showing the candidate and supporters, with testimonials and pledges for the future.
